Plot: A nun, while comforting a convicted killer on death row, empathizes with both the killer and his victim's families.
Title: Dead Man Walking
Actors: Susan Sarandon, Sean Penn, Robert Prosky, Raymond J. Barry
tomatoConsensus: A powerful, thought-provoking film that covers different angles of its topic without resorting to preaching, Dead Man Walking will cause the viewer to reflect regardless of their political viewpoint.
